testcase.classname: As a tester I want to do GET, POST, PUT and DELETE requests on the pet shop
testcase.name: Get available pets, create available pet, update available pet to sold and delete pet
testcase.system-out: Given Values to do the requests.............................................passed When I do a Get to available pets...........................................passed Then I should see a 200 status code in the get response.....................passed And I should see a body that is not empty in the get response...............passed And I should see contains values id as number...............................passed And I should see contains values name as string.............................passed And I should see contains values photoUrls as string........................passed And I should see contains available status..................................passed When I do a Post to add new available pet...................................passed Then I should see a 200 status code in the post response....................passed And I should see a body that is not empty in the post response..............passed And I verify that the pet has been added correctly..........................passed When I do a Put to update the status of the pet to sold.....................passed Then I should see a 200 status code in the put response.....................passed And I should see a body that is not empty in the put response...............passed And I verify that the pet status has been updated to sold...................passed When I do a delete to remove the pet........................................passed Then I should see a 200 status code in the delete response..................passed And I should see a body that is not empty in the delete response............passed And I verify that the pet has been removed..................................passed
